item.title: DOWNLOAD GITHUB PROFILE USING COMMAND PROMPT
item.description: Guys,Hope you are well and think new stuff. Today i’ll show you how can we download github users profile data using windows command prompt. Well i want to clear here, you can only download directory which is public not private. So, i know you and not intrested in reading much and here for show direct action in short words. Firstly let’s see actual bash script and then we’ll talk about working and more.
